resp = client.indices.create(
    index="mv",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "b": {
                "type": "long"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.bulk(
    index="mv",
    refresh=True,
    operations=[
        {
            "index": {}
        },
        {
            "a": 1,
            "b": [
                2,
                2,
                1
            ]
        },
        {
            "index": {}
        },
        {
            "a": 2,
            "b": [
                1,
                1
            ]
        }
    ],
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.esql.query(
    query="FROM mv | EVAL b=TO_STRING(b) | LIMIT 2",
)
print(resp2)
